languages.text: {n}Впервые лицо эльдара искривляет усмешка.{/n} "Мы пережили гибель родного мира-корабля, скитались во тьме космоса без дома, защиты, семьи и надежды на будущее. Нас истязали, убивали, сводили с ума и продавали на потеху темных кузенов. Считаешь, горстка мон-кай может нас запугать? Есть вещи, пережив которые перестаешь бояться забвения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Впервые лицо эльдара скривляет усмешка.{/n} "Мы пережили гибель родного мира-корабля, скитались во тьме космоса без дома, защиты, семьи и надежды на будущее. Нас истязали, убивали, сводили с ума и продавали на потеху темных кузенов. Считаешь, горстка мон-кай может нас запугать? Есть вещи, пережив которые перестаешь бояться забвения".

languages.text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, without a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."
languages.original_text: {n}Впервые лицо эльдара искривляет усмешка.{/n} "Мы пережили гибель родного мира-корабля, скитались во тьме космоса без дома, защиты, семьи и надежды на будущее. Нас истязали, убивали, сводили с ума и продавали на потеху темных кузенов. Считаешь, горстка мон-кай может нас запугать? Есть вещи, пережив которые перестаешь бояться забвения".

traits.locale_text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our Craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane and sold off for the amusement of the dark cousins. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa altera las facciones del Aeldari por primera vez.{/n} «Sobrevivimos a la destrucción de nuestro mundo astronave, vagamos por la negrura del espacio sin hogar ni protección, sin familia ni esperanza por el futuro. Fuimos atormentados, masacrados, enloquecidos y vendidos para divertimento de nuestros cogéneres oscuros. ¿De verdad crees que un puñado de mon-keigh nos van a intimidar? Existen cosas peores en la galaxia; y cuando se sobrevive al olvido, este ya no inspira ningún temor».
languages.original_text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, without a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa altera las facciones del Aeldari por primera vez.{/n} «Sobrevivimos a la destrucción de nuestro mundo astronave, vagamos por la negrura del espacio sin hogar ni protección, sin familia ni esperanza por el futuro. Fuimos atormentados, masacrados, enloquecidos y vendidos para divertimento de nuestros oscuros parientes. ¿De verdad crees que un puñado de mon-keigh nos van a intimidar? Existen cosas peores en la galaxia; y cuando se sobrevive al olvido, este ya no inspira ningún temor».

languages.text: {n}这位艾达灵族脸上第一次露出了微笑，但却是扭曲的微笑。{/n}“我们从毁灭的方舟世界中幸存下来，在黑暗的太空中游荡，无家可归，无处可依，家人离散，前途一片灰暗。我们被折磨、被屠杀、被逼疯，还被卖给那些阴暗的表亲，供他们取乐。莫非你真的以为，一群猴子就能吓倒我们吗？银河系中还有无数更可怕的事情，只要你经历过那些事情，你就不再会畏惧死亡。”
languages.original_text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, without a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位艾达灵族脸上第一次露出了微笑，但却是扭曲的微笑。{/n}“我们从毁灭的方舟世界中幸存下来，在黑暗的太空中游荡，无家可归，无处可依，家人离散，前途一片灰暗。我们被折磨、被屠杀、被逼疯，还被卖给那些黑暗的表亲，供他们取乐。莫非你真的以为，一群猴子就能吓倒我们吗？银河系中还有无数更可怕的事情，只要你经历过那些事情，你就不再会畏惧死亡。”

languages.text: {n}Un sourire déforme les traits de l'Aeldari pour la première fois.{/n} « Nous avons survécu à la destruction de notre vaisseau-monde, puis erré dans les ténèbres de l'espace sans protection, ni famille, ni espoir pour l'avenir. Nous avons été tourmentés, massacrés, rendus fous et vendus pour le plaisir de nos sombres cousins. Croyez-vous sérieusement qu'une poignée de mon-keigh va nous intimider ? Il existe des choses bien pires dans la galaxie, et après leur avoir survécu, même la mort ne nous fait plus peur. »
languages.original_text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, without a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire déforme les traits de l'Aeldari pour la première fois.{/n} « Nous avons survécu à la destruction de notre vaisseau-monde, puis erré dans les ténèbres de l'espace sans protection, ni famille, ni espoir pour l'avenir. Nous avons été tourmentés, massacrés, rendus fous et vendus pour le plaisir de nos sombres cousins. Croyez-vous sérieusement qu'une poignée de mon-keigh va nous intimider ? Il existe des choses bien pires dans la galaxie, et après leur avoir survécu, même la mort ne nous fait plus peur. »

languages.text: {n}アエルダリは初めて笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「我々は方舟の滅亡を生き延び、故郷もなく、保護もされず、家族もなく、未来への希望もなく、宇宙の闇をさまよった。我々は苦しみを味わい、虐殺され、狂わされ、闇のともがらたちの娯楽のために売り払われた。一握りのモン＝ケイ風情が、我々を脅せると本気で思っているのか？銀河にはもっと悪しきものがある。一度生き延びれば、忘却を恐れることはない」
languages.original_text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, without a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリは初めて笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「我々は方舟の滅亡を生き延び、故郷もなく、保護もされず、家族もなく、未来への希望もなく、宇宙の闇をさまよった。我々は苦しみを味わい、虐殺され、狂わされ、闇のともがらたちの娯楽のために売り払われた。一握りのモン＝ケイ風情が、我々を脅せると本気で思っているのか？銀河にはもっと悪しきものがある。一度生き延びれば、忘却を恐れることはない」

languages.text: {n}Zum ersten Mal zeigt sich auf der Miene des Aeldari ein Grinsen.{/n} "Wir haben den Niedergang unseres Weltenschiffs überlebt, sind ohne Zuhause oder Schutz oder Familie oder Hoffnung oder Zukunft durch die Dunkelheit des Alls geirrt. Wir wurden gepeinigt, abgeschlachtet, in den Wahnsinn getrieben und zur Belustigung unserer dunklen Verwandtschaft verkauft. Glaubt Ihr wirklich, eine Handvoll Chem-Pan-Sey können uns einschüchtern? Es gibt in der Galaxie schlimmere Dinge, und wenn man die erst einmal überlebt hat, fürchtet man das Nichts nicht länger."
languages.original_text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, without a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zum ersten Mal zeigt sich auf der Miene des Aeldari ein Grinsen.{/n} "Wir haben den Niedergang unseres Weltenschiffs überlebt, sind ohne Zuhause oder Schutz oder Familie oder Hoffnung oder Zukunft durch die Dunkelheit des Alls geirrt. Wir wurden gepeinigt, abgeschlachtet, in den Wahnsinn getrieben und zur Belustigung der dunklen Vettern verkauft. Glaubt Ihr wirklich, eine Handvoll Chem-Pan-Sey können uns einschüchtern? Es gibt in der Galaxie schlimmere Dinge, und wenn man die erst einmal überlebt hat, fürchtet man das Nichts nicht länger."

languages.text: {n}Aeldari'nin yüz hatlarında ilk defa bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Dünyamızın çöküşünün ardından hayatta kaldık, ne yuvamız ne de korumamız olmadan uzayın karanlığında dolanıp durduk, ne ailemiz ne de gelecek için umudumuz kaldı. Karanlık soydaşlarımızın keyfi için eziyet gördük, katledildik, aklımızı yitirdik ve satıldık. Gerçekten bir avuç mon-keigh'in gözümüzü korkutabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Galakside çok daha kötü şeyler var ve hiçlikten sağ kurtulduktan sonra ondan korkun da kalmıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}A smile twists the Aeldari's features for the first time.{/n} "We survived the demise of our craftworld, wandered the darkness of space without a home or protection, without a family or hope for the future. We were tormented, butchered, driven insane, and sold off for the amusement of our dark kin. Do you really think a handful of mon-keigh can intimidate us? There are worse things in the galaxy, and you do not fear oblivion once you have survived them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari'nin yüz hatlarında ilk defa bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Dünyamızın çöküşünün ardından hayatta kaldık, ne yuvamız ne de korumamız olmadan uzayın karanlığında dolanıp durduk, ne ailemiz ne de gelecek için umudumuz kaldı. Karanlık soydaşlarımızın keyfi için eziyet gördük, katledildik, aklımızı yitirdik ve satıldık. Gerçekten bir avuç mon-keigh'in gözümüzü korkutabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Galakside çok daha kötü şeyler var ve hiçlikten sağ kurtulduktan sonra ondan korkun da kalmıyor."
